pkgmetadata.longdescription: AdaBoost Framework for Any Classifier // This is a simple package which provides a function that boosts pre-ready or custom-made classifiers. Package uses Discrete AdaBoost (doi:10.1006/jcss.1997.1504) and Real AdaBoost (doi:10.1214/aos/1016218223) for two class, SAMME (doi:10.4310/SII.2009.v2.n3.a8) and SAMME.R (doi:10.4310/SII.2009.v2.n3.a8) for multiclass classification.
